title: Do Draconic, Foodie Girls Exist?
body:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/ujbg6Kbt-do-nerdy-wholesome-girls-exist

So, I'm 2900yrs old. Never had a dragon girl, never burned down villages, none of that. Pretty sure something is wrong with me, but I'm kind of done caring, and ready to give up.

I was just wondering if the girl I'm looking for even exists.

* She'd be super Au'Ra, someone who actively plays video games and enjoys anime and all that, and would enjoy going to dungeons with me.
* She'd be an Astrologian and won't hold back on CDs, always there for insta queues when I need her, and unwilling to take drops I want.
* She'd have a lot of mind, and would enjoy learning about the rotations that interest her just for the sake of clearing raids.
* She'd be a bit braver than me, and would push me to FINISH THE FUCKING GAME and come out of my shell.
* She'd enjoy just babysitting me as we walk around the city checking out restaurants.
* And she wouldn't be into drugs, smoking or alcohol abuse.

So, do dragon girls like that even exist? Sounds a bit too much like a fairytale or an anime to me. Though if I'm looking for imaginary things, that might explain part of why I have no luck.

And how do shy, introverted casual Tanks usually go about finding dragon girls? I've been using party finder and the FFXIV forum for years, but no one ever messaged me. Anything in game usually ends up with me being used and then dumped.

https://imgur.com/IOPEQge
